attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned ask for Birmingham to be at the forefront of environmental action by providing publically accessible recycling bins (for paper, drinks cans and plastic bottles) in the City centre and in populace areas around the city.

These bins would allow the people of Birmingham and guests to the city to recycle waste not just at home, as is currently the case, but while they were visiting other areas of the city.

We ask for the Government to support Birmingham City Council in bringing recycling bins to the streets of our city as soon as is possible.
